verses.verse: Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah<WH3414> the second<WH8145> time, while he was yet<WH5750> shut<WH6113> up in the court<WH2691> of the prison,<WH4307> saying,<WH559>
Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> the maker<WH6213> thereof, the LORD<WH3068> that formed<WH3335> it, to establish<WH3559> it; the LORD<WH3068> is his name;<WH8034>
Call<WH7121> to me, and I will answer<WH6030> you, and show<WH5046> you great<WH1419> and mighty<WH1219> things, which you know<WH3045> not.

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> concerning<WH5921> the houses<WH1004> of this<WH2063> city,<WH5892> and concerning<WH5921> the houses<WH1004> of the kings<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> which are thrown<WH5422> down<WH5422> by the mounts,<WH5550> and by the sword;<WH2719>

They come<WH935> to fight<WH3898> with the Chaldeans,<WH3778> but it is to fill<WH4390> them with the dead<WH6297> bodies<WH6297> of men,<WH120> whom<WH834> I have slain<WH5221> in my anger<WH639> and in my fury,<WH2534> and for all<WH3605> whose<WH834> wickedness<WH7451> I have hid<WH5641> my face<WH6440> from this<WH2063> city.<WH5892>
Behold,<WH2005> I will bring<WH4608> it health<WH724> and cure,<WH4832> and I will cure<WH7495> them, and will reveal<WH1540> to them the abundance<WH6283> of peace<WH7965> and truth.<WH571>
And I will cause the captivity<WH7622> of Judah<WH3063> and the captivity<WH7622> of Israel<WH3478> to return,<WH7725> and will build<WH1129> them, as at the first.<WH7223>

And I will cleanse<WH2891> them from all<WH3605> their iniquity,<WH5771> whereby<WH834> they have sinned<WH2398> against me; and I will pardon<WH5545> all<WH3605> their iniquities,<WH5771> whereby<WH834> they have sinned,<WH2398> and whereby<WH834> they have transgressed<WH6586> against me.

And it shall be to me a name<WH8034> of joy,<WH8342> a praise<WH8416> and an honor<WH8597> before all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> of the earth,<WH776> which<WH834> shall hear<WH8085> all<WH3605> the good<WH2896> that I do<WH6213> to them: and they shall fear<WH6342> and tremble<WH7264> for all<WH3605> the goodness<WH2896> and for all<WH3605> the prosperity<WH7965> that I procure<WH6213> to it.

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> Again<WH5750> there shall be heard<WH8085> in this<WH2088> place,<WH4725> which<WH834> you say<WH559> shall be desolate<WH2717> without<WH369> man<WH120> and without<WH369> beast,<WH929> even in the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> that are desolate,<WH8074> without<WH369> man,<WH120> and without<WH369> inhabitant,<WH3427> and without<WH369> beast,<WH929>

The voice<WH6963> of joy,<WH8342> and the voice<WH6963> of gladness,<WH8057> the voice<WH6963> of the bridegroom,<WH2860> and the voice<WH6963> of the bride,<WH3618> the voice<WH6963> of them that shall say,<WH559> Praise<WH3034> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts:<WH6635> for the LORD<WH3068> is good;<WH2896> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769> and of them that shall bring<WH935> the sacrifice of praise<WH8426> into the house<WH1004> of the LORD.<WH3068> For I will cause to return<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of the land,<WH776> as at the first,<WH7223> said<WH559> the LORD.<WH3068>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> Again<WH5750> in this<WH2088> place,<WH4725> which is desolate<WH2717> without<WH369> <WH5704> man<WH120> and without<WH369> <WH5704> beast,<WH929> and in all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> thereof, shall be an habitation<WH5116> of shepherds<WH7462> causing their flocks<WH6629> to lie<WH7257> down.<WH7901>

In the cities<WH5892> of the mountains,<WH2022> in the cities<WH5892> of the vale,<WH8219> and in the cities<WH5892> of the south,<WH5045> and in the land<WH776> of Benjamin,<WH1144> and in the places about<WH5439> Jerusalem,<WH3389> and in the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> shall the flocks<WH6629> pass<WH5674> again<WH5750> under<WH5921> the hands<WH3027> of him that tells<WH4487> them, said<WH559> the LORD.<WH3068>

Behold,<WH2009> the days<WH3117> come,<WH935> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that I will perform<WH6965> that good<WH2896> thing<WH1697> which<WH834> I have promised<WH1696> to the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and to the house<WH1004> of Judah.<WH3063>

In those<WH1992> days,<WH3117> and at that time,<WH6256> will I cause the Branch<WH6780> of righteousness<WH6666> to grow<WH6779> up to David;<WH1732> and he shall execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and righteousness<WH6666> in the land.<WH776>

In those<WH1992> days<WH3117> shall Judah<WH3063> be saved,<WH3467> and Jerusalem<WH3389> shall dwell<WH7931> safely:<WH983> and this<WH2088> is the name with which<WH834> she shall be called,<WH7121> The LORD<WH3068> our righteousness.<WH6664>
For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> David<WH1732> shall never<WH3808> want<WH3772> a man<WH376> to sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478>

Neither<WH3808> shall the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> want<WH3772> a man<WH376> before<WH6440> me to offer<WH5927> burnt<WH5930> offerings, and to kindle<WH6999> meat offerings,<WH4503> and to do<WH6213> sacrifice<WH2077> continually.<WH3605> <WH3117>
And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> If<WH518> you can break<WH6565> my covenant<WH1285> of the day,<WH3117> and my covenant<WH1285> of the night,<WH3915> and that there should not be day<WH3119> and night<WH3915> in their season;<WH6256>

Then may also<WH1571> my covenant<WH1285> be broken<WH6565> with David<WH1732> my servant,<WH5650> that he should not have<WH1961> a son<WH1121> to reign<WH4427> on his throne;<WH3678> and with the Levites<WH3881> the priests,<WH3548> my ministers.<WH8334>

As the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> cannot<WH3808> be numbered,<WH5608> neither<WH3808> the sand<WH2344> of the sea<WH3220> measured:<WH4058> so<WH3651> will I multiply<WH7235> the seed<WH2233> of David<WH1732> my servant,<WH5650> and the Levites<WH3881> that minister<WH8334> to me.
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

Consider<WH7200> you not what<WH4100> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> have spoken,<WH1696> saying,<WH559> The two<WH8147> families<WH4940> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> has chosen,<WH977> he has even cast<WH3988> them off? thus they have despised<WH5006> my people,<WH5971> that they should be no more<WH5750> a nation<WH1471> before<WH6440> them.

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> If<WH518> my covenant<WH1285> be not with day<WH3119> and night,<WH3915> and if I have not appointed<WH7760> the ordinances<WH2708> of heaven<WH8064> and earth;<WH776>

Then<WH1571> will I cast<WH3988> away the seed<WH2233> of Jacob <WH3290>and David<WH1732> my servant,<WH5650> so that I will not take<WH3947> any of his seed<WH2233> to be rulers<WH4910> over<WH413> the seed<WH2233> of Abraham,<WH85> Isaac,<WH3446> and Jacob:<WH3290> for I will cause their captivity<WH7622> to return,<WH7725> and have mercy<WH7355> on them.
